description:
Brians Song - 1971



Gale Sayers joins the Chicago Bears and is befriended by Brian Piccolo,
an over-achieving running back. Although they compete for the same spot
on the team, and despite the fact that Sayers is black and Piccolo white,
they become roommates on the road and very close friends, especially
when Sayers is injured and Piccolo helps his recovery. Later, they and
their wives must both deal with the harsh reality of Piccolo's cancer.
